mapper.select:
select COUNT(live.id) from _live live LEFT JOIN custom_branch customBranch ON customBranch.id = live.live_branch
live.del_flag = '0' AND live.live_end_time > CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND ((live.live_branch = #{branchId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND live.live_scope = "LIVE_LOCAL_BRANCH") OR (live.live_hospital = #{hospitalId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND live.live_scope = "LIVE_LOCAL_HOSPITAL") OR (customBranch.branch_id = #{sameBranchId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND live.live_scope = "LIVE_SAME_BRANCH") OR (live.live_scope = "LIVE_ALL_HOSPITAL")) AND live.live_name LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{param,jdbcType=VARCHAR}),'%')

select COUNT(id) from _live
del_flag = '0' AND create_user = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
